channel.title: [PI] makeover mage changing "runescape" to my server name
channel.description: subject explains all, no where in client or source does it let me edit runescape to switch to my server name how is this possible?

item.title: [PI] makeover mage changing "runescape" to my server name
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

X-J-K-X:

rsinterfacetext = rsinterfacetext.replaceAll(“Runescape”, “SERBER”);

You are just terrible at giving help. It’d have been better if you just left no response at all.

bowzer:

subject explains all, no where in client or source does it let me edit runescape to switch to my server name how is this possible?

You’ve got 2 options. 1) Change it client sided. 2) Change it server sided.

  1. https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=656950.0 <That’s kinda what x-j-k-x said to do. But you know, it actually tells you what to do instead of just giving you a random line of code.

The “parent” is the char design interface. the Id is the id of the text.
you’d use it like…

Read full topic
